entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Strong type support in Microsoft.Extensions.Logging #61947
  • [wasm] JS Interop tests failing with latest chrome - `JavaScript host object 'SharedArrayBuffer' not found` #61945
  • arm64 jitstress failing with `encoding_found` assert #61944
  • MAUI Startup Improvement #61941
    Future
  • Could emit branchless form of i >= 0 && j >= 0 for signed integers #61940
  • Number of jit tests failing with `needLabel` assert #61939
    7.0.0
  • Guard against partial cleanup of extracted files issue is happening again #61936
  • Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration Binder attempts to bind to Readonly Static Property #61932
  • Expression.Convert fails to convert byte to nint. #61929
  • [iOS][tvOS] Generic math SByte and Int16 test failures #61920
  • Use of CoreCLR GC in conservative stack scanning mode #61919
  • Port rule CA1011 - Consider passing base types as parameters #61916
  • Unexpected behavior of TimeSpan.FromSeconds #61909
  • Investigate adding capture support for RegexOptions.NonBacktracking #61904
    7.0.0
  • Add RegexGenerator support for RegexOptions.NonBacktracking #61903
    7.0.0
  • Finish "simplified" regex codegen strategy #61902
    7.0.0
  • Test failure JIT\\HardwareIntrinsics\\X86\\X86Base\\Pause_ro\\Pause_ro.cmd #61901
    7.0.0
  • Test failure JIT/Methodical/eh/disconnected/catchbeforetrybody_d/catchbeforetrybody_d.sh #61900
    7.0.0
  • Test failure JIT/Performance/CodeQuality/Benchstones/BenchF/MatInv4/MatInv4/MatInv4.sh #61899
    7.0.0
  • Test failure JIT/HardwareIntrinsics/Arm/Crc32.Arm64/Crc32.Arm64_ro/Crc32.Arm64_ro.sh #61897
    7.0.0
  • Port re2 regex tests #61896
    7.0.0

Closed

  • [Perf] Changes at 11/17/2021 1:35:01 AM #61821
  • Mono jit/hardwareintrinsics/x86/x86base/pause tests failing #61693
  • Future of the IFormatter infrastructure, safe polymorphic deserialization (not just BinaryFormatter) #50909
    Future
  • Add SerializationInfo.TryGetValue API #42460
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Introduce a common base type for ECDsa and ECDiffieHellman #61516
    7.0.0
  • AES Encryption broken on Dot Net 6 #61918
  • IObjectReference binary deserialization for objects with circular references crashes #42636
    Future
  • Add MaxDepth to JsonWriterOptions #44947
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Add ``CompressionNative_InflateInit_`` and ``CompressionNative_DeflateInit_`` to clrcompression. #61910
  • JIT: Incorrectly optimized double-negation in face of inlining #61908
    7.0.0
  • system.text.regularexpressions.tests.regexmatchtests.match_cachedpattern_newtimeoutapplies #61794
  • Test failure System.Security.Cryptography.Dsa.Tests.DsaArrayOffsetSignatureFormatTests.BadSignatureFormat #61578
  • Issues using debugger in Blazor WASM project since .NET 6 upgrade #61924
  • [Mono] Fix android rolling build failures #61343
    7.0.0
  • CryptoStream.Read adds "null" add the EOF #61886
  • Failed test System.Security.Cryptography.Rsa.Tests.KeyGeneration.GenerateKey_2048 #61905
  • [HTTP] RemoveStalePools should never run in parallel #61505
    7.0.0
  • Regression in multiple benchmarks from value numbering #61375
    7.0.0
  • XXHash64/32 incorrect one-shot implementation #61878
  • FileStream does not lock file on mounted filesystem #61836
  • System.Linq.Parallel OrderedPipeliningMergeEnumerator.MoveNext is using API unsupported on browser #43752
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Implement PEM exports for RSA PKCS#1 and ECPrivateKey #61946
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, cryptographic-docs-impact
  • Cleanup some code using ECAlgorithm #61943
    area-System.Security
  • WIP: first group project for type generator tests 0-99 #61942
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • PE loader/image investigations #61938
    * NO MERGE *, NO REVIEW, area-VM-coreclr
  • [wasm] Misc CI/test run improvements #61937
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Enable QJFL and OSR by default for x64 #61934
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Type memory maps with placeholders #61933
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [6.0] Check for time-sensitive work when worker thread starvation is ongoing #61931
    area-System.Threading, 6.0.x
  • Check for time-sensitive work when worker thread starvation is ongoing #61930
    area-System.Threading, 7.0.0
  • Update DI external tests for Stashbox #61928
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, community-contribution
  • [wasm][debugger] Protecting send message to debugger if it's disabled #61927
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Initial version with the following features: #61926
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Fix XXHash for stripe size #61923
    * NO MERGE *, Servicing-consider, area-System.IO
  • Disable several GenericMath tests on iOS/tvOS #61922
  • Skip Linq tests, which are not supported in interpreter only build (without FEATURE_COMPILE) #61914
    area-System.Linq.Expressions
  • Support zero-byte reads on HTTP response streams #61913
    area-System.Net.Http, .NET 7.0
  • Fix `optComputeLoopSideEffects` to account for HWI stores #61911
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add backtracking loops, backreferences, and if-then-else constructs to Regex "simplified" code gen #61906
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Add CancellationToken to TextReader.ReadXAsync #61898
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution

Merged

  • Extract ECAlgorithm from ECDsa and ECDiffieHellman #61753
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, cryptographic-docs-impact
  • Fix regression in IsPrefix / IsSuffix benchmarks #61935
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 7.0.0
  • Adding support for the X86Base.Pause intrinsic on Mono #61707
    area-Codegen-meta-mono
  • Update list of analyzer diagnostics with JSON entries #61809
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • Vectorize SpanHelpers<T>.IndexOf #60974
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution
  • Add a JsonWriterOptions.MaxDepth property #61608
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Don't special case "Experimental" projects #60641
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Use correct VN relation kind for redundant relop opts #61912
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Delete Regex timeout tests with RegexOptions.Debug #61888
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • make System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates compliant with interop guidelines - part 3 #61435
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Do not explicitly pass type to `VNForMapStore` #61882
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [Mono] Enable some skipped Android tests #61771
    area-System.Net
  • Skip eventpipe_readevents for arm32 #58545
    area-Tracing-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: refactor to allow OSR to switch to optimized #61851
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix XXHash for stripe size #61881
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Default BuildTargetFramework to NetCoreAppCurrent for GenerateReferenceAssemblySource #61760
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Make System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement use GeneratedDllImport #61805
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 7.0.0
  • Rename CORINFO_FLG_CONTAINS_STACK_PTR to CORINFO_FLG_BYREF_LIKE #61907
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [HTTP] Scavange fix #61530
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Mark PLINQ as enabled in WASM and make browser compat changes #58227
    arch-wasm, area-System.Linq.Parallel
  • Fix a few special cases of projects with command line arguments #61758
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Actually use TargetOS=AnyOS in the build-test-job (Try 2) #61801
    area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Add RateLimiting APIs #61788
    area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Unify lengthof/string_lengthof -like macros #61537
    community-contribution
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 1481838 #61858
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Remove AOT warnings for S.Drawing.Common #61567
    area-System.Drawing, community-contribution
  • Update previous netcoreapp version to run API Compat against 6.0 ref pack #61437
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Brand release/6.0-maui branch appropriately #61792
  • Updating the x64 casting behavior to be IEEE 754 compliant and to use saturation for overflow #61761
    breaking-change, area-CodeGen-coreclr, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • [wasm][debugger] Add test for ignoring stepping into hidden function. #61312
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [WIP]: Accelerate additional cross platform hardware intrinsics #61649
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [DRAFT][MONO][TEST] Wasm AOT runtime tests #57963
    area-Infrastructure-mono, runtime-mono, wasm-aot-test
  • [System.Text.Json] Move inline throw statements to `ThrowHelper` #61746
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • S.IO.StringReader: Use ReadOnlySpan.IndexOfAny in ReadLine() for performance #60463
    area-System.IO, tenet-performance, community-contribution
  • [wasm] workaround test results corruption #61841
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Remove string allocation from XmlTextEncoder.WriteCharEntity #61774
    area-System.Xml, needs more info, community-contribution
  • Change all "unmanaged" (no GC fields) sequential types to have sequential layout. #61759
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [wasm] Test chromebug #61856
    NO REVIEW, arch-wasm
  • CI matrix change: add Windows Server 2022 #60163
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Stabilize host's UpgradeCode and ProviderKey #61810
    area-Setup, 7.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] First draft of debug on firefox #61776
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Add zlib-ng library, optimized for ARM64 #61883
    area-System.IO.Compression, 7.0.0
  • [mono][interp] Fix handing of native types #61612
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [wasm] Force console #61854
    NO REVIEW, arch-wasm
  • Optimize FMA codegen base on the overwritten #58196
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Build HttpStress and SslStress with live-built runtime using current TFM #61689
    area-System.Net
  • Added AsReadOnly extension methods for IDictionary<T, U> and IList<T> #61172
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • removed argument requestId from loopbackserver.cs #58678
    area-System.Net
  • FileSystem.Unix: Directory.Delete: remove per item syscall. #59520
    area-System.IO, tenet-performance, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [DRAFT][wasm] debug multiple runtimes #61848
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [mono] Don't use recursion in mono_ssa_rename_vars #61677
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Support Process.Start() on MacCatalyst #61507
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process
  • [Mono] Fix support for nested structs with explicit layout #61467
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Expose general purpose Crc32 APIs #61558
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Mono hot reload reorg and beginning (disabled) add method support #61853
    area-EnC-mono
  • Baseline System.Speech for trimming errors #61874
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework, community-contribution
  • [TODO-List-Cleanup] Delete `NumChildren`, `GetChild` and `gtGetChildPointer` #61875
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [TODO-List-Cleanup] Delete dead code from `InferStructOpSizeAlign` #61880
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [TODO-List-Cleanup] Delete the quirks #61876
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [JIT] [Issue: 61620] Optimizing ARM64 for *x = dblCns; #61847
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Use separate partials for iOS&tvOS instead of UnknowUnix in System.Diagnostics.Process #61871
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process
  • [wasm] Add a new supported signature for pinvokes #61667
    arch-wasm
  • [release/6.0] <EnablePreviewFeatures> for HttpStress #60682
    area-System.Net.Http, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Exclude the managed code around libproc on iOS/tvOS (#61590) #61659
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Diagnostics.Process, os-ios, 6.0.x
  • [WASM] Fix v8 trimming tests on windows #53698
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [release/6.0] disable sending NT Authority in TLS handshake if specific trust was specified #61713
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Net.Security, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0] [HTTP/3] Fixed stress #60723
    area-System.Net.Http, 6.0.x
  • Fix parsing of ping error replies on raw sockets #61592
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • CI matrix: add openSUSE 15.2 - second attempt #60161
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add NetCoreAppCurrent configurations to Microsoft.Extensions libraries #61867
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • fix for excessive gen0 in high memory load situation #61884
    area-GC-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] Use workloads to run AOT tests #61863
    arch-wasm
